html:
1.27.21  5:57 am   When I write music, it always very melancholic & sad, how do you keep your music so positive?
Also, love your work, keep it up, might be the best thing I ever saw on Internet!

      try this: take all your sad thoughts and put them to happy music. this is a winning combination that has worked for generations

1.27.21  5:37 am   what editing software do you use?

     i still don't know

      I'm getting into video editing but iMovie is pretty limited

     i have a hard personal rule that my software has to be openly scriptable. that's just the only way i'm going to get the kind of access that i need. but unfortunately there's almost no scriptable software for video editing, and the ones i thought had it are actually very incomplete in their scriptability. at this point i'm considering using a scriptable program even if it's not quite meant for video editing

1.27.21  5:15 am   A usually come up with new songs in my mind while i'm just walking, but lately I always get earworms that prevent me from getting a new tune in my head. How can I overcome this problem?

      hm. i think you should spend some time at your instrument, or main songwriting station. and just sort of improvise for several days. really try to come up with things no one has ever played before. then that should jump-start your mind to be a bit more resourceful and exploratory next time you're out and about

1.27.21  4:23 am   how long do you usually take to make a song and video

      a very reasonable, respectable amount of time

1.27.21  3:57 am   On the song "you're free to do whatever you want to", why did you pick "and it's Wednesday / and it's Thursday" and not, say, Sunday and Monday?

      i suppose i was trying to convey the feeling that the week has somewhat progressed

1.27.21  3:43 am   what is the difference between helvetica and helvetica neue?

      got to be the girth

1.27.21  3:43 am   why do you spell "rageon" like that in here comes the sun

      keep my options open

1.27.21  3:23 am   Music theory or nay?

      what the heck is nay. actually what the heck is music theory

1.27.21  2:26 am   I have trouble expressing how I feel about things and would like to start doing so through music. What do you recommend for someone starting to make music just for themselves?

      you could try getting some sort of instrument

1.27.21  1:39 am   what mathematical equation most inspired your music?

      2x3=3x2

1.27.21  1:35 am   did you create here comes the sun in the 2000s or the 2010s?

      it was produced in 2020. it was written in 2010/2012/2020

1.27.21  12:02 am   Do you ever feel like you think completely different from everyone else, or perhaps you're perfectly fine but you have an excessive imagination?

      yes

1.26.21  11:44 pm   where did the trees come from?

      underground

1.26.21  11:24 pm   is it a coincidence that "might quit" came out right before you maybe quit?

      yes, except there is an important detail that i should add here which is that i did not quit and never intended to quit

1.26.21  11:19 pm   what kinds of questions do you usually answer?

      normal questions

1.26.21  11:16 pm   Hey Bill! Just wanted to thank you for all the awesome work you do. You truly improve people's lives and give them something to smile about. So, for my question, what is your favorite song that you have ever made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.26.21  10:25 pm   Are you ever going to make a song about songs?

      at least 20% of my songs are about songs

1.26.21  10:19 pm   why is the concept of love so prevalent in many of your songs?

      because they are very normal songs

1.26.21  10:07 pm   What's the best way to avoid stress from ineptitude? 

      begin to notice just how inept everyone else may be

1.26.21  9:44 pm   How do you leave room 3A? I'm tired of Sad. 

      under one of the chairs, you can glitch out i think

1.26.21  9:43 pm   Mount St. Helens remastered version in 3d when

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

1.26.21  9:28 pm   i used to write lots of songs but i haven't since last year how do i start again what do i write about

      write about everything. first, just make a list of everything. that should calm you down a bit

1.26.21  8:22 pm   I'm at the airplane terminal, and I'm feeling fine in an unusual way. What is my plane number again? I forget.

      it's the first one

1.26.21  7:46 pm   how do you come up with your ideas for your videos?

      it's the other way around. i come up with videos for my ideas

1.26.21  6:50 pm   Do you like the music you make?

     i like half of it

     Would you change something about it?

      yes, the other half

1.26.21  6:44 pm   What inspired you to create songs?

      trying to see what they can do

1.26.21  6:34 pm   what do you think about the events that have happened in the world the past few billion years

      1 out of a billion events could lead to the next billion events

1.26.21  5:31 pm   I really liked how after the lyrics "time waits for no one/and it doesn't wait now either" you went straight into that instrumental, like time wasn't waiting for that verse to be completed. Was that intentional, or just a fun coincidence?

      that's on purpose

1.26.21  5:12 pm   Do you think it's unavoidable or even necessary to create mediocre/shitty music or art on your way to creating really good stuff? 

      yes

1.26.21  4:50 pm   are people over analyzing your songs

      yes, but that's only one side of the story. they are also under analyzing them, and sometimes analyzing them just the right amount

1.26.21  4:15 pm   have you thought of a name for your new video you're making

      yes

1.26.21  3:51 pm   Any tips on developing confidence in expressing yourself creatively?

      do 10 things, make some of them good and some of them bad. see which ones you like better

1.26.21  3:24 pm   Im getting into song writing and I cant stick to a genre. I wrote something very chillwave the other week and then the past 2 days I made something that has a marching band vibe to it. Would it be better to try and stick to a genre or just kinda flow with whatever Im coming up with?

      genres can't even stick to genres

1.26.21  3:19 pm   hit a wall in the middle of making a song. what do

      take a 24 hour break. if you don't have time, then walk to the door of the room, touch the door, then re-set the song to the start, and listen to the whole thing you have so far, and really pretend you are hearing it for the first time.

1.26.21  2:16 pm   did you go to a class for what you do

      no, but i've spent a lot of time in class thinking about it. even if the class was doing something else

1.26.21  1:39 pm   If there's a North and South Dakota, there wheres the East and South Dakota?!

      sioux falls, for sure

1.26.21  1:35 pm   how did you decide when to sing "come" instead of "comes" in the latest song?

      i guess it depends which regional dialect i think i have at that particular moment

1.26.21  1:30 pm   is it hard for you to write songs?

      no, but sometimes i forget that

1.26.21  1:27 pm   did you write "might quit" to tell us you were going on a hiatus to learn 3d animation?

      no. i wrote it while i was excited about doing music videos every 1 week instead of 2

1.26.21  1:17 pm   you used capitals in the title of We Could Just Get High so you really do use capitals

      yes

1.26.21  1:15 pm   time signature of movie star?

      mostly 9/4, with some exceptions in the verses and bridge

1.26.21  12:51 pm   How do you know when you finished one of your songs?

      when i don't think i can make it any better

1.26.21  12:41 pm   Have you ever thought of giving your song ideas swords and making them fight to the death?

      yes, that's what happens in the song selection process

1.26.21  12:24 pm   In 2017 you made "i wanna be a movie star".
Now that everyone watches "here comes the sun", it's a better time than ever to make "i Am the movie star".

      i have some other songs that might fit this subject matter

1.26.21  12:07 pm   is there still no news

      there is news but you have to figure out which one is the news

1.26.21  12:04 pm   how do some of these questions make you feel?

      different from some of the the others. that's for sure

1.26.21  11:47 am   how can i get better at animation?

      try making a sequence of images. then make a sequence of slightly faster images

1.26.21  11:27 am   After all these years, am I still stupid for liking the stupid songs you write? 

      they're smart now. but you're stupid for liking those. and you're smart for liking the dumb ones

1.26.21  11:23 am   Bill who's going to win the Super Bowl

      CBS

1.26.21  11:20 am   not a question but I just wanted to say that your song 'When I get older' is one of the most catchy songs I've heard and that I think its the perfects mix of humour and interesting lyrics.  So thanks for that.

      holy smokes you are very friendly
